00071 // ____ T Y P E  D E F I N I T I O N _______________________________________
00072 
00073 typedef struct
00074 {
00075    U32 dwDTERate;
00076    U8 bCharFormat;
00077    U8 bParityType;
00078    U8 bDataBits;
00079 }S_line_coding;
00080 
00081 // type for set control line state message
00082 // cdc spec 1.1 chapter 6.2.14
00083 typedef union
00084 {
00085    U8 all;
00086    struct {
00087       U8 DTR:1;
00088       U8 RTS:1;
00089       U8 unused:6;
00090    };
00091 }S_line_status;
00092 
00093 // type for hardware handshake support 
00094 // cdc spec 1.1 chapter 6.3.5
00095 typedef union
00096 {
00097    U16 all;
00098    struct {
00099       U16 bDCD:1;
00100       U16 bDSR:1;
00101       U16 bBreak:1;
00102       U16 bRing:1;
00103       U16 bFraming:1;
00104       U16 bParity:1;
00105       U16 bOverRun:1;
00106       U16 reserved:9;
00107    };
00108 }S_serial_state;
